梬字的基本解释

梬
yǐng
古书上说的一种果子。亦称梬枣、软枣、黑枣。

梬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐng］
［《廣韻》以整切，上静，以。］
梬枣。

梬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梬； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页530第16
【唐韻】以整切【集韻】以井切【正韻】于丙切，?音郢。【說文】棗也。似?。【司馬相如·子虛賦】?棃梬栗。【張揖註】梬，梬棗也。【李善註】梬棗似?而小，名曰㮕。又【上林賦】梬棗楊梅。並言梬卽棗也。詳桾字註。　又【類篇】丑郢切，音逞。義同。○按《齊民要術》：?有小者栽之，無者取枝于㮕棗根上揷之。蓋㮕本棗名，非脯之而後名㮕。

梬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
梬字的起名意思

暂无。

Tang
Basic explanation of words
Tang
yǐng
A kind of fruit said in ancient books. Also known as 梬 jujube, soft jujube, and black jujube.
Tang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐng］
["Guangyun" is cut by the whole, on the quiet, by. ]
Jujube.
Tang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梬; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 530 Chapter 16
[Tang Yun] Cut with whole [Ji Yun] Cut with Jing [Zheng Yun] in Bing cut,? Yin Ying. [Said the text] Jujube too. like?. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】? Di Li Li. [Zhang Ye's Note] 梬, 梬zao also. 【Li Shan's Note】Like a jujube? But small, the name is 㮕. Also [Shanglin Fu] Jujube bayberry. And also said that the date is also 卽卽. Detailed notes on the word 桾.　[Classes] Ugly, sharp, sound. The same meaning. ○According to "Qi Min Yao Shu": Some small ones will plant them, and those who have no will take the branches from the jujube roots. Gai 㮕 the name of the jujube, the name 㮕 after not the candied fruit.
Tang
